alert.note: Alert for Phillips (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 12 at 1:17AM CDT until March 12 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Phillips County in eastern Arkansas... Southwestern Coahoma County in northwestern Mississippi... * Until 100 AM CST. * At 1216 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near White River National Wildlife Refuge to Trusten Holder WMA to near Pea Ridge, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Clarksdale, White River National Wildlife Refuge, Crumrod, Sherard, Mellwood, Rena Lara, Mosby Spur, Ferguson, Bobo, Green Grove, Hillhouse, Beverly, Catron, Ratio and Lundell. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
